movies.name: Mission Impossible : 4
movies.description: The IMF is shut down when it's implicated in the bombing of the Kremlin, causing Ethan Hunt and his new team to go rogue to clear their organization's name.

movies.name: Extraction
movies.description: Tyler Rake, a fearless black market mercenary, embarks on the most deadly extraction of his career when he's enlisted to rescue the kidnapped son of an imprisoned international crime lord.
movies.cast: Chris Hemsworth,Tyler Rake,Rudhraksh Jaiswal,Ovi Mahajan,Randeep Hooda,Saju,Pankaj Tripathi,Ovi Mahajan Sr.

movies.name: Bad Boys For Life
movies.description: Miami detectives Mike Lowrey and Marcus Burnett must face off against a mother-and-son pair of drug lords who wreak vengeful havoc on their city.

movies.name: The Dark Knight
movies.description: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.
movies.cast: Christian Bale,Bruce Wayne,Heath Ledger,Joker,Aaron Eckhart,Harvey Dent,Michael Caine,Alfred,Gary Oldman,Gordon

movies.name: The Dark Knight
movies.description: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.
movies.cast: Christian Bale,Bruce Wayne,Heath Ledger,Joker,Aaron Eckhart,Harvey Dent,Michael Caine,Alfred,Gary Oldman,Gordon

books.name: The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes
books.description: A delight for a public which enjoys incident, mystery, and above all that matching of the wits of a clever man against the dumb resistance of the secrecy of inanimate things, which results in the triumph of the human intelligence.

books.name: Treasure Island
books.description: Treasure Island is an adventure novel by Scottish author Robert Louis Stevenson, narrating a tale of buccaneers and buried gold.

books.name: Alice in Wonderland
books.description: Alice's Adventures in Wonderland is an 1865 novel written by English author Charles Lutwidge Dodgson under the pseudonym Lewis Carroll. It tells of a young girl named Alice falling through a rabbit hole into a subterranean fantasy world populated by peculiar, anthropomorphic creatures.

books.name: The Handmaid's Tale
books.description: Offred is a Handmaid in the Republic of Gilead. She may leave the home of the Commander and his wife once a day to walk to food markets whose signs are now pictures instead of words because women are no longer allowed to read
